channel.title: How can i change the exp for each hit on npc?

item.title: How can i change the exp for each hit on npc?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

look for public boolean AttackNPC() { and under it find if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(# * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(# * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } change the #'s to however much xp you want them to get per hit

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the exp for each hit on npc?
